tooltip.menu_new_pattern: Click "Pattern" menu option to create a new melodic pattern

tooltip.Square+ADSR: To start with, you will need to drag the instrument to the drop zone

tooltip.pattern_instrument_dropzone: perfect! you just assigned the instrument to the track. Click this tooltip to continue

tooltip.pattern_track_event_area: Now, you can add musical notes. Click the area above to insert a new note
Great!, now, try to add another one
Awesome!, you can drag them to re-assign value and position, move one of the notes you just created
Also, you can change the duration of the event by dragging from the right edge (like resizing), feel free to try it, or click play button to hear your creation and continue the tutorial

tooltip.pattern_play: Now, we are going to compose a song using this pattern. Click this tooltip to continue

tooltip.pattern_name_input_box: Optionally, you can name your pattern here

tooltip.menu_new: Click "new" menu option, this time to create the song

tooltip.menu_new_song: Click "Song" menu option to create a new song

tooltip.song_pattern_dropzone_0_0: Drag your pattern to this block

tooltip.song_pattern_dropzone_0_1: Drag your pattern to this another block

tooltip.song_play: Click this button to hear your creation
You should hear your pattern play twice...

tooltip.song_rec: Click this button to export an audio file of the song. You should get a .WAV file after playing the song

tooltip.song_rec_confirm: Review record options, and click this button when ready

tooltip.song_rec: Your song is being recorded, please wait until it ends...
Congratulations! you learned how to create a song using music.js. Click this tooltip to dismiss
